page.title: 09MANOR BAKERIES
page.content: The man who owns the bakery is called Mr. Barnett.He runs it with his wife,Mrs.Barnett.He starts his work at 6.00a.m. in the morning.The main ingredients he uses for home made bread are flour,salt,yeast,water,with extras of powdered milk and lard.He also makes brown bread.He does vanilla slices,tarts.....etc.Most of his fruit pies are made with dried fruit,which is put into a bowl and reconstituted.The fruit he uses in his pies are apple and blackberry, and apple.The machines he has are 3 mixers in different action.The big mixer was made in 1965.The 2 small mixers were made in 1950.He also had a tart machine.He had a divider for dividing dough,made in 1940.He had a moulder made in 1948.
